channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: If you know of a good to great introduction to quantum computing, please share a link.
item.source:markdown: If you know of a good to great introduction to quantum computing, please share a link.

item.description:
Tweetfeed is an interesting experimental FREE service courtesy of @davewiner it creates an RSS feed of a person's Twitter stream. I've just started playing with it. In fact I need to decide which RSS reader to use. Suggestions?

https://t.co/gSde8fdhwT
item.source:markdown:

https://t.co/gSde8fdhwT

item.description: A delightful interview with Brian Kernighan, a true legend, with the focus on AWK. QUOTE:"If stranded on an island with only one programming language it would have to be C." https://t.co/ZuqT4dzgRK
item.source:markdown: A delightful interview with Brian Kernighan, a true legend, with the focus on AWK. QUOTE:"If stranded on an island with only one programming language it would have to be C." https://t.co/ZuqT4dzgRK

item.description: I hope this image is real. If it is, there's still a chance our civil society will prevail. https://t.co/Fm9VozSHop
item.source:markdown: I hope this image is real. If it is, there's still a chance our civil society will prevail. https://t.co/Fm9VozSHop

item.description: @_pjfinn well above your (impressive!) average, I am hoping it is sooc but maybe this was done in post processing?
item.source:markdown: @_pjfinn well above your (impressive!) average, I am hoping it is sooc but maybe this was done in post processing?

item.description: @kenklippenstein You do know this is basically a proof of concept release, using existing Qwest headset with no GPU support. Let's see what it looks like and how it functions using the MUCH more capable hardware that's in development.
item.source:markdown: @kenklippenstein You do know this is basically a proof of concept release, using existing Qwest headset with no GPU support. Let's see what it looks like and how it functions using the MUCH more capable hardware that's in development.

item.description: @jemmawei @apf What an incredible story.

item.description: What a super sweet kid. My heart goes out to family and friends. May he rest in peace. https://t.co/3TjnEBMuvH
